id.description: The unique identifier for the usage record

invoice.description: The ID of the invoice associated with this usage record

livemode.description: Indicates whether this usage record is in live mode or test mode

object.description: Represents the type of object, in this case, 'usage_record'

period.description: The period during which the usage occurred

start.description: The start date of the usage period

end.description: The end date of the usage period

subscription_item.description: The item within the subscription that this usage record is associated with

total_usage.description: The total quantity of units used for this usage record
